Notes:

Send a table and the data
Male and female sentences
- Sort by longest sentence - by FY

Add fiscal year
Sort longest sentences at the top
Grab inmate id, county, fiscal year, unduplicated

```{r query}
current_quarter <- Sys.Date() %>% 
  floor_date("quarter")

if (paste(current_quarter, "sentence data.csv") %in% )
connect_ojo()

sents <- ojo_tbl("doc_sentences") %>%
  filter(js_date > "2009-06-30") %>%
  left_join(ojo_tbl("doc_profile")) %>% 
  collect()

disconnect_ojo()

write_csv(sents, paste(current_quarter, "sentence data.csv"))

```
